entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:19 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
